title: Gala games
body:
**Proposal for:** [Gala]

[Gaming token whit nft sell, 1M+ users a month!!]

### Technical details

- **Token Name:** [Gala]
- **Token Address:** [0x15D4c048F83bd7e37d49eA4C83a07267Ec4203dA, 0x7ddee176f665cd201f93eede625770e2fd911990]
- **Token Type:** [Token, NFT, gaming]
- **Token Chain** [Binance Smart Chain, Ethereum]

- **Link to the whitepaper:** [Link]
- **Team doxxed:** [Yes]


What is Gala Games (GALA)?
Gala Games aims to revolutionize the gaming industry by putting players back in control of their games. Gala Games' mission is to "make blockchain games that you really want to play". The project aims to change that players can spend hundreds of dollars on in-game assets and spend hours playing the game, while it can be over at the click of a button. In addition, they want to reintroduce creative thinking into games, by giving players control over the games and in-game assets, using blockchain technology.

Players can own non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and influence game governance in the Gala Games ecosystem. The Founder's Nodes voting mechanism allows players to influence which games Gala develops and which games should receive funding. In addition to purchasing NFTs for specific games, Gala Games uses its own utility token called GALA. So far, Gala Games has released one playable game Town Star and an NFT collectible series VOX. More games will be released in the future, such as fantasy RPG game, sci-fi strategy game and tower defense game.

Since its launch in 2019, Gala Games has had 1.3 million monthly active users and 26,000 NFTs have been sold, the most expensive of which is worth $3 million.

Who are the founders of Gala Games?
Eric Schiermeyer is the founder of Gala Games. He was the co-founder of Zynga, a popular social and mobile games company. Under Schiermeyer's leadership, Zynga launched the popular games Poker, Mafia Wars and Farmville. Schiermeyer is a leader in gaming. He launched Gala Games in July 2019 to create a blockchain-based gaming network and give players more control over their games.

The Gala Games team consists of 60 employees.

What makes Gala Games unique?
Gala Games is not one game, but offers a complete range of different blockchain games, with fun at the forefront and blockchain in the background. Town Star, the only playable game to date, is a city-building simulation game that can be played in a browser. Players control a city, which is similar to SimCity gameplay, but in Town Star they own the city.

VOX are Gala Games' collectible NFT avatars. Each VOX is unique and some VOXs are rarer than others. At launch, 8,888 VOX were distributed for an average price of 0.0888 ETH or about $280 at the time. Although VOX is inspired by Town Stars, it is more than just an avatar of NFT. Owners can pin GALA and earn VOXcoin by playing with their VOX avatars in the future. Owners of VOX get their own FBX file, which they can use to animate their avatars or even print them in 3D in the future.

There are also other games in development. Fortified is a player-versus-player tower defense game set in an amazing medieval world. Players will compete to build the best tower defense strategies.

Mirandus is a fantasy role-playing game (RPG) set in a gigantic world controlled by five player kings. Players can own in-game assets and claim parts of the in-game landscape.

Echoes of Empire is a sci-fi strategy game set in a galaxy at war. Players can own their own spaceships and control parts of the galaxy.

Spider Tank Project is an online battle arena multiplayer game where players can choose a "spider tank" to fight against other players. The game is free to play, but contains in-game monetization mechanisms. The release is planned for the fourth quarter of 2021.

Community feedback is an important part of developing these games. Gala Games is constantly involving the community on Discord in the development phase. This allows players to influence the direction and design of the games.
author: 0x0681b82E9270e8520E962861a7E214C416E69110
